A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I know people are divided but I loved the last jedi. It's not a perfect movie by far or even a perfect Star Wars movie but it finally takes us a new\, fresh direction opening possibilities for future movies in the franchise instead of lazily re-making the same movies with new actors (Force awakens). Sure there's lots of flaws but i truly enjoyed it and am excited to see what will come next. I like that it was nothing I expected and opens up new possibility with a little more darkness which feels more real and grounded.
